Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.analysis

Class FrDics

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.analysis.FrDics
public class FrDics extends Object
Preloaded word List for lucene indexation in HashMap. Efficiency strongly rely on a custom implementation of chars token attribute CharsAttImpl, with a cached hash code CharsAttImpl.hashCode() and comparison CharsAttImpl.compareTo(CharsAttImpl).

    • load

    • load

      public static void load(Reader reader)
      Insert a local csv (comma separated values) dictionary of 4 cols:
      • 0. GRAPH. Required, graphical form used as a key (could be a lemma for verbs in locutions like “avoir l’air”).
      • 1. TAG. Required, morpho-syntaxic code.
      • 2. ORTH. Optional, form normalization.
      • 3. LEM. Optional, lemmatization.
      Parameters:
      reader -
